Edges-Combat -- Female Human Heroic Fighter
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Young: -1 Attribute Points
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d8
Athletics: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Repair: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common; Ignan
Skill Notes:
Young: -2 Skill Points
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Feint: Force foe to oppose Fighting test with Smarts instead of Agility
Free Runner: +2 Athletics (climbing)/+2 on foot chases
Killer Instinct: May reroll self-initiated opposed Test
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Calistria (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 10; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (7 points): Block; Brawler; Bruiser; Calculating; Combat Reflexes; Counterattack; Danger Sense; Dead Shot; Dodge; Extraction; Feint; First Strike; Formation Fighter; Free Runner; Frenzy; Giant Killer; Hard To Kill; Harder To Kill; Improved Block; Improved Counterattack; Improved Dodge; Improved Extraction; Improved First Strike; Improved Frenzy; Improved Level Headed; Improved Nerves Of Steel; Improved Rapid Shot; Improved Sweep; Improved Trademark Weapon (Short Sword); Improvisational Fighter; Iron Jaw; Killer Instinct; Level Headed; Marksman; Mighty Blow; Nerves Of Steel; No Mercy; Rapid Reload; Rapid Shot; Steady Hands; Sweep; Trademark Weapon (Short Sword); Two-Weapon Fighting Hindrances: Big Mouth; Driven+; Young Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Driven+: Has overwhelming need to fulfill personal goal
Young: +1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 10 (2) Cover: -2 Toughness: 11 (3) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Medium Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (+2 d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d6)
Combat Notes:
Block: +2 Parry/-2 foe Gang Up bonus
Brawler: +2 Toughness/+2 Unarmed damage step
Bruiser: Increased Brawler effects
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Improved Block: Increased Block effects
Improved Counterattack: Increased Counterattack effects
Improved Extraction: Increased Extraction effects
Improved First Strike: Increased First Strike effects
Improved Frenzy: Increased Frenzy effects
Improved Level Headed: Increased Level Headed effects
Improved Nerves Of Steel: Increased Nerves Of Steel effects
Improved Rapid Shot: Increased Rapid Shot effects
Improved Sweep: Increased Sweep effects
Improved Trademark Weapon (Short Sword): Increased Trademark Weapon effects
Trademark Weapon (Short Sword): +2 attack and Parry with Short Sword
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Calculating: Ignores 2 points of penalties on 1 action when Action Card is 5 or less
Combat Reflexes: +2 on Shaken and Stunned recovery rolls
Counterattack: Free attack after failed foe attack 3/rd
Dead Shot: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage from first successful ranged attack
Dodge: -2 foe ranged attacks
Extraction: Negate attack of 3 foes when withdrawing
First Strike: Free attack when foe moves into reach 3/rd
Formation Fighter: +1 Gang Up bonus (+4 max)
Free Runner: Move full Pace on difficult ground
Frenzy: Extra Fighting die on 2 attacks/rd
Giant Killer: +1d6 damage vs. foes of size 3 or greater
Hard To Kill: Ignores wound penalties on Vigor tests to avoid bleeding out
Harder To Kill: 50% chance to cheat death
Improved Dodge: +2 evading area attacks
Improvisational Fighter: No penalty w/improvised weapons
Iron Jaw: +2 Soak rolls/+2 Vigor vs. knockout
Level Headed: Choose best of 3 Action Cards
Marksman: May forego move for +1 ranged attack or to ignore 2 ranged attack penalties
Mighty Blow: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage on first successful melee attack
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 2 points of wound penalties
No Mercy: +2 on Benny damage reroll
Rapid Reload: Reduces reload value of chosen ranged weapon by 1
Rapid Shot: Increase ROF by 1 2/rd
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform; reduces running shot penalty by 1
Sweep: May make attack on all within reach
Two-Weapon Fighting: No multi-action penalty for melee attack with each hand
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 7 available vs. 43 allocated
